title: Rest Is Warfare
verse_text: Remember the Sabbath day by keeping it holy…. On it you shall not do any work.
insight: Rest is not laziness; it’s obedience.
Rest isn’t escape - it’s resistance against a world that worships busyness.
one_minute_win: Unplug for 30 minutes today - no screens, just God.
declaration: Rest is my weapon, not my weakness.
related_devotionals: Matthew 11:28 Devotional - Rest for the Weary
Psalm 23:2 Devotional - He Makes Me Lie Down
